Source code for stats.svGPFA.svLowerBound


import pdb
import torch


[docs]class SVLowerBound:

    def __init__(self, eLL, klDiv):
        self._eLL = eLL
        self._klDiv = klDiv


[docs]    def eval(self):
        eLLEval = self._eLL.evalSumAcrossTrialsAndNeurons()
        klDivEval = self._klDiv.evalSumAcrossLatentsAndTrials()
        theEval = eLLEval-klDivEval
        return theEval



[docs]    def evalELLSumAcrossTrialsAndNeurons(self, svPosteriorOnLatentsStats):
        answer = self._eLL.evalSumAcrossTrialsAndNeurons(
            svPosteriorOnLatentsStats=svPosteriorOnLatentsStats)
        return answer



[docs]    def buildKernelsMatrices(self):
        self._eLL.buildKernelsMatrices()



[docs]    def computeSVPosteriorOnLatentsStats(self):
        self._eLL.computeSVPosteriorOnLatentsStats()



[docs]    def setInitialParams(self, initialParams):
        self._eLL.setInitialParams(initialParams=initialParams)



[docs]    def setKernels(self, kernels):
        self._eLL.setKernels(kernels=kernels)



[docs]    def setMeasurements(self, measurements):
        self._eLL.setMeasurements(measurements=measurements)



[docs]    def setIndPointsLocs(self, locs):
        self._eLL.setIndPointsLocs(locs=locs)



[docs]    def setQuadParams(self, quadParams):
        self._eLL.setQuadParams(quadParams=quadParams)



[docs]    def getSVPosteriorOnIndPointsParams(self):
        return self._eLL.getSVPosteriorOnIndPointsParams()



[docs]    def getSVEmbeddingParams(self):
        return self._eLL.getSVEmbeddingParams()



[docs]    def getIndPointsLocs(self):

[docs]    def getKernelsParams(self):

[docs]    def predictLatents(self, newTimes):
        return self._eLL.predictLatents(newTimes=newTimes)
